The Program

The Hunter Douglas Global Trainee Program is an exclusive, executive-sponsored 10-month journey designed to shape you into a future leader. From day one, you’ll dive into our business, culture, and industry, gaining a comprehensive view of our operations.

You’ll join a community of driven peers and learn directly from our top leaders. Travel first to our NY office to learn from our CEO and his direct reports. Then you will visit key North American locations to witness how our innovative products are crafted and sold. You’ll contribute to meaningful projects and see the impact of your work firsthand.

During the program, you’ll rotate through product innovation, sales, logistics, and supply chain teams, getting hands-on experience in creating our top-quality products. You’ll also explore our global business services to understand how these roles support our success.

After completing the 10-month program, you’ll transition into a full-time role within one of our functional areas. To be eligible, you must be a recent graduate (within the last two years) with no more than two years of professional experience.
